meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, the family reoccupied their home.
meanings.sent2: The soldier reoccupied the strategic position to defend against the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The cat reoccupied its favorite spot on the windowsill after the dog left.
meanings.sent4: The students quickly reoccupied their seats after the fire drill.
meanings.sent5: The explorer reoccupied the abandoned campsite to continue the expedition.

meanings.sent1: The chef reoccupied the empty plates with delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The audience reoccupied the seats as the show was about to start.
meanings.sent3: The children happily reoccupied the playground after the rain stopped.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were quickly reoccupied with new books after the sale.
meanings.sent5: The garden was reoccupied by colorful flowers in the spring.
